description:
SAP has introduced new generative capabilities for its Joule AI assistant to help developers by automating tedious tasks. SAP says that it’s actively embedding AI capabilities across its Business Suite, including SAP Build, application development, and automation solutions. These tools are designed to help businesses extend and create bespoke applications with greater efficiency. The company... Read more »

The post SAP supports developers with new Joule AI capabilities appeared first on Developer Tech News.
title: SAP supports developers with new Joule AI capabilities
